content: Hi. I've loaded a bundle into the visualizer and it shows the Resource nodes but not the connections. I've tried several types of bundles including ones that have worked in the visualizer before. I've tried two browsers. Here's one of the bundles that worked previously: https://pastebin.com/WwLrrphZ
OOps - I must have broken something! Will take a look - and thanks for adding a sample!
thanks @David Hay It's working. Thanks so much. The visualizer really helps with sharing with colleagues.
